title: Cylindrical Grinding Machine Operator
jobDescription:
Dear Applicant,


We have an urgent opening of Cylindrical Grinding in Himdustan Platinum.


Loc: Turbhe- Navi Mumbai


Exp 2+ years


JD:


- Ability to setup & operate the Cylindrical Grinding machines.

- Understand Engineering Drawings to grind as per specifications.

- Determine grinding speeds, feed rates & grinding wheels to be used as per the standard operating procedures.

- Operating the Cylindrical Grinding machines in line with Work Instruction, Process sheet, drawings, control plan etc.,

- To ensure proper handling, storage & preservation of components available in shop.

- Follow safety procedures and work instructions for personal and equipment safety.

- Work under the guidance of Supervisor/Manager to perform and complete the assigned duties in timely manner.



Interested candidate share resume to rakshitak0603@gmail.com

title: Walkin Interviews For Team Lead - Shift Incharge Qualitykiosk !!!
jobDescription:
Dear Candidate,


We have walkin interviews for  Team Lead - Shift Incharge Role.


Role: Team Lead Role - Shift Incharge
Experience: 3 to 6 Years. (At least 1 Year experience into Team Handling Role) 
Male Candidates Only

Job Location: Ghansoli (Work from Office - Rotational Shift )


Interview date 7th,8th & 9th August 2024.
Interview Time 10.00 AM to 03.00 PM
Interview Mode Face to face
HR SPOC - Anisa Patel
Venue Details - Quality Kiosk Technologies Pvt. Ltd., C Wing, Rupa Solitaire, Sector-1, Millennium Business Park, 419A, MBP Rd, Mahape, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400710.


Position Statement / Purpose:
A team leader is someone who provides direction, instructions and guidance to his team, for the purpose of achieving BU goal and SLAs. An effective leader will know his team members strengths, weaknesses and motivations.


Key Deliverables (Key Result Areas):
Stakeholder Management
Communication Skills
Client-facing skills
Problem Solving Skills
Ability to work as one team
Adaptability
Work under pressure
Team Management



Key Responsibilities (Job Description):


Project Management- Knowledge of Project life cycle and implementation skills.
Stakeholder Management: Ability to connect and influence Internal and External Stakeholders to understand and fulfil their requirement.
Communication skills: Good communicator and the ability to make complex solutions presentable in a simple and easy to understand language.
Client-facing skills: Ability to work with people at multiple levels.
Problem Solving Skills: Should be able to listen and work with clients to fully understand their challenges.
Ability to work as one team: Operate as a team and not in silos
Adaptability: Understanding of new technologies and platforms.
Work under pressure: Ability to work in a dynamic & pressure environment
Team Management: Confident to drive the team independently


Key Performance Measures and KPIs:
Delivering 100% as per SLA and SOP for the allocated zones
Maintain and continuously improve the Service Quality of the Process
Resolving customer complaints, challenges that are raised in his allocated zones.
Accountable for team & people management, workload planning, process adherence and building team capability.
Anticipates and meets the needs of both internal and external customers. 
Manage the entire shift for the allocated Zones. Forecast Staffing and Scheduling of activities for the team.
Managing Attrition and Absenteeism of the team.
Conduct monthly One-On-Ones and Annual PMS for the team
Motivate and inspire team members, so that they can deliver beyond all constraints. Lead team building activities. Resolve team conflicts if any.
Encourage creativity, risk-taking, and constant improvement of Team/ Process
Manage/ identify material (Hardware and Software) on the floor as per requirement and raise it to the Logistics team. Identify Technical or IT related constraints if any and raise it to Operations Manager


KPIs
oPerformance
Experience of 3 or more years of independently handling the team
Domain knowledge - Any one of BFSI/ Ecommerce/ Automotive/ Fintech/ Payment Wallets etc.
Excellent Verbal and Written communication skills.
Analytical Approach & Logical Reasoning
SLA customer satisfaction/ VOC


Kindly share your resume - anisa.patel@qualitykiosk.com


Regards,
Anisa Patel

title: QA-Manual Testing
jobDescription:
Our Client Protegrity is looking for Engineer- QA(Manual Testing)
 Job Designation: Engineer- QA(Manual Testing)
 Job Location: Navi Mumbai 
 Experience: 2- 5Years.
  
 
 Job Description
 As a key member of Protegrity Products group you will be responsible to provide with testing and certification services to the various products developed across all Protegrity development centers.
 Main Responsibilities:
  Creation of test plans,  test requirements and test cases.
  Establishment of test procedures,  and product certifications.
  Maintain and update test cases according to new features and platforms.
  Specification and execution of longevity tests.
  Specification and execution of performance and stability tests.
  Test status reporting,  as part of product release,  or on demand certification.
  Generation of bug reports,  and tracking.
  Supporting the development team by reproducing customer issues.
  Maintenance of test platforms to provide complete coverage of supported systems and configurations.
  Understand and be able to write database scripts to validate and test data integrity and performance.
  
 
 Required skills:
  Traditional QA resource with 2- 3 years of experience in Manual testing(GUI and Server Side testing)
  Should have working experience in writing/ executing DB SQL query
  Should have experience installing and configuring UNIX machine
  Should have working experience in executing Automation scripts
  Should have working experience in Web services testing (SOAP/ RestFul)
  Should have working experience in API testing
  Working experience with Database systems: Postgre SQL/ SQL ite
  Working experience with testing of multi- threaded application
  Worked predominantly in Unix /  Linux environment
  Has worked in a small/ medium scale product based company
  
 
 Desired skills:
  Knowledge and experience with Bugzilla,  Jira and Testopia
  Knowledge of communication protocols such as HTTP,  TCP/ IP
  Working experience in LDAP
  Working experience in Security domain
  Working experience in appliance based product testing
  
 
 About company
  
 
 Protegrity is the world s innovation leader in true enterprise data security,  with a very strong customer base on the Fortune 1000 worldwide list. Specializing in the most advanced encryption and tokenization solutions on the market,  as well as the only centralized enterprise- wide data security management,  auditing and reporting available today,  our dedication to the highest product and service standards is unmatched in the industry. In an effort to expand the technological expertise within Protegrity,  we have established the largest and exclusive technical center of excellence for Protegrity in India viz,  Lakeside Infotech in Jan 2013. Our skilled team of Engineers in this center have been contributing significantly since the past 2 years to research,  development,  quality assurance,  professional services and technical support of entire Protegrity product suite and solutions. As part of the ongoing expansion in India,  we are looking to add Product management capabilities in India
 Website -  http:/ / www.protegrity.com/ 
  
 
 Skills Must have 
 Oracle SQL PLSQL (Postgree Sql) Teradata Netteza Db2 Greeplum Shell scripting rhel aix hpux linux envt. Linux Unix For web services -  soap UI Restful
 Interview Address
 1504/ 1505, building no. A- 1 Rupa Slitaire,  sector 1 Millennium Business park ,  Navi mumbai -  400710
  
 
 This is an Immediate Opportunity candidate with less than one month notice will be preferred.

title: Psychologist - Intervention Delivery
jobDescription:
Slim. in,  a lifestyle change based weight management intervention is looking for Psychologists to deliver its group programmes in communities across India.  It is a unique opportunity to work with an innovative,  young company introducing Psychology to lifestyle related health issues at scale.  The intervention has been developed with inputs from psychology & nutrition and consists of weekly 1. 5 hour sessions.  It incorporates the latest research in behaviour change around weight management following a comprehensive literature review. 
India is the third largest obese country in the world with more than 30mn people with obesity.  If one includes people who are overweight,  this number jumps to 100mn.  Obesity is linked to a significant number of health challenges including diabetes which affects more than 60mn people in India.  Globally,  3 risk factors (poor diet,  lack of physical activity and tobacco use) are linked to four diseases that account for 50% of deaths.  Slim. in deals with two out of the three factors for now,  and plans to develop an intervention for the third (tobacco) soon. 
Slim. in was published in Health:  Our Business (PDF,  5mb) ,  an initiative to find innovative interventions by the Global Chief Medical Officers network as part of the Clinton Global Initiative. 
Locations 
We are currently recruiting for Mumbai and Navi Mumbai. 
Responsibilities 
In short,  it is the programme leader s responsibility to ensure that every participant is successful in losing weight and keeping it off. 
In broad terms,  this means the following
 Deliver 1. 5 hour sessions to groups of up to 20 people.  Each group meets once a week 
 Meet every potential attendee and assess their suitability for slim. in meetings (stages of change assessment,  motivational interviewing,  explaining how slim. in can help,  etc) 
 Regularly conduct free slim. in taster sessions.  These give useful information about healthy eating and showcase how slim. in works 
 Record participant s measurement data 
 Continuously improve the intervention 
 Over time,  contribute to research literature around weight loss interventions In addition to the above clinical responsibilities,  the Leader will also be responsible for operational elements around delivering the meetings including,  but not limited to,  billing,  printing and distributing handouts (if necessary) and the like. 
Over time,  we will look at interesting ways to make a wider impact on society.  This could include training community ambassadors to disseminate healthy living messages,  speaking at schools and colleges about healthy eating and creating/ executing interventions that can be delivered at scale by non- professionals. 
Qualifications and Skills 
Leaders will need to have bilingual fluency in English and at least one regional language to conduct group sessions. 
Educational qualifications 
 Bachelor's degree in psychology with at least five years of experience in the field of mental health OR 
 Master's degree in psychology with at least two years of experience in the field of mental health OR 
 Pre- doctoral (M. Phil) or doctoral degree in Psychology 
 Candidates with significant experience are encouraged to apply Skills 
 Empathy is key to being a successful slim. in Programme Leader 
 Voracious reader,  and an ability to assimilate information quickly 
 Genuine interest in helping people 
 Experience of /  demonstrated comfort in handling small groups of 12 -  20 people 
 Ability to work independently 
 Comfortable with technology.  We use a variety of IT tools to manage our operations 
 Interdisciplinary bent of mind Salary 
Salary is not a constraint for the right candidate
Hours of operation 
We are looking for full- time and part- time professionals.  Please indicate your preference while completing the application form
